_comment: Model mapping configuration for Ollama to OpenAI/VLLM proxy
_description: Maps Ollama model names (keys) to their OpenAI/VLLM equivalents (values)
_usage: Set MODEL_MAPPING_FILE environment variable to the path of your mapping file
_note: These mappings override the default mappings built into the application
_example_mappings: Common Ollama to Hugging Face model mappings
